attributes.action: A vote of no confidence it David Cameron and the Conservative government .
attributes.additional_details:
The government is allowing fracking under national parks and residential areas despite the risk to life and the environment.  More people use food banks and more children are in poverty.  University education is becoming elitist and only open to the highest bidder, property ownership is only a dream for the majority. 

This cannot go on.
attributes.background: Today Jeremy Hunt announced his intention to push through changes to the contracts of Junior Doctors, despite the UK public opposing the move and in contrast to his own over-inflation pay rise.  This is another in a long line of broken promises made by this government endured by the UK tax-payer.
